thread.title_full: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 11 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
text:
Chris Cannon Chris Cannon Age: 63
Residence: Westwood
Occupation: Owner and operator of Mister Charleston Tourist Services
 government and public administration, University of South Carolina
 343-5113, ChrisCannonVoteCharleston@gmail.com , www.ChrisCannonVoteCharlestonCityCouncil.com
 Outdoors, hunting, fishing, golf
 More than 30 years working in the city of Charleston; Johns Island Council chairman since 2003; Charleston County Republican Party Executive Committee, 1994-2013 and first vice chairman 2000 to 2006.
 Control annexation and expansion by the city and concentrate on improving the current city area.
Bill Moody Age: 71
Residence: Harrison Acres, West Ashley
Occupation: CPA
 business administration, The Citadel
 2011
Contact information: (843) 364-5292, moodyw@comcast.net , www.votemoody.com
 Grandchildren and traveling with wife
 I was in charge of governmental auditing with our firm and have vast experience in that field. I am very familiar with the budgeting process.
 To protect the Charleston brand, the reawakening of West Ashley by providing the leadership for private sector investments, deployment of city resources for infrastructure and complete Interstate 526
